name: Cyber Data Coalition
goal:
The Coalition is an unincorporated association with a non-for-profit purpose.

The objective of the Coalition is to represent the interests of forward-thinking SMEs that have in common the following activities: Collect, Analyse and Process Data to Identify and/or Secure organisations and people.

More information on http://cyberdatacoalition.eu/cdc-articles/
interests: Borders and Security, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: Innovation • Internet • Telecommunications • Technology • Safety • ecommerce • Consumer protection • Access to markets • Data protection • Skills • Copyright • Education • Smart cities • Liability of intermediaries • child protection • SME and entrepreneurship • Competition
